channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:08 Air alarm in Kyiv -followed by further messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:08 Air alarm in Kyiv -followed by further messages.#M_Kyev This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
